thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location
thread.title_full: Excellent location - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Joyce H
title: Excellent location
text: Ideal location as just five minutes from Waterloo station & minutes from the waterfront. Rooms very comfortable: hot showers, TV, wi fi, no noise from traffic. Reception staff friendly & efficient. I feel I can always rely on Premier Inn for consistently high standards. A plus too : a restaurant for breakfast & meals.
